data.text: @ChuckGrassley Y’all need to read the Epstein files. Shows Trump, Bannon, Epstein committed treason against the USA. Also, child rape and trafficking. Punishment for treason? Death, imprisonment, disqualification from holding office. The PEOPLE demand justice for Americans and for victims.

@ChuckGrassley The Islamic Republic spent decades funding and arming America’s enemies.
Nearly 2,000 U.S. troops were killed as a result.
The richest terrorist network in history—built on Iran’s oil and gold.
That’s a betrayal of American blood.
And a betrayal of the Iranian people as well. https://t.co/lqj5QdGmxG
@ChuckGrassley @grok The reason I asked, he seems to be hiding 🙈 instead of going after anyone involved in the Epstein Files.

@GrokPOS_Tracker @ChuckGrassley No, based on reviews of the unsealed Jeffrey Epstein court documents and lists of mentioned individuals from sources like Wikipedia and PBS, U.S. Senator Chuck Grassley is not named or referenced in them.
@ChuckGrassley @grok was @chuckgrassley listed in the Epstein Files?
@ChuckGrassley The Save Act? Get it done!
